content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mining at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position -17.0, -50.0) and transport belt (position -16.5, -51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and transport belt (position -15.5, -51.5)
-  Transport belt (position -14.5, -51.5) that connects the burner mining drills to the rest of the structure

### Iron ore transportation at position(-14.5, -51.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Transport belt (position -14.5, -51.5) that connects the iron ore mining structure to the rest of the factory
-  Transport belt (position -13.5, -51.5) that connects the iron ore mining structure to the furnace

### Furnace at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position -10.0, -49.0) with no fuel

### Inserter and chest system at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter (position -16.5, -46.5) that puts items into the wooden chest (position -16.5, -47.5)
-  Wooden chest (position -16.5, -47.5) with no items

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using undefined functions
-  Make sure to define the function before using it, for example, `get_eny` should be replaced with `get_entity` or `get_entities`

### Errors when placing entities without checking for space
-  Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it

### Errors when using furnaces without fuel
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the furnace before using it

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables:
    *   `wooden-chest`: 2
    *   `transport-belt`: 7
    *   `burner-mining-drill`: 1
    *   `stone-furnace`: 1
    *   `iron-ore`: 1080
    *   `iron-plate`: 168
